["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["ELPA 是 Emacs 内建包管理器 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"package.el"}]," 的软件源，镜像站支持了常见的 ELPA，具体各个镜像站提供的 EPLA，需要前往各镜像站确认，链接如下"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"根据你的需求，设置 package-archives，比如用 GNU ELPA 和 MELPA："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(setq package-archives '(("gnu"    . "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/gnu/")
                         ("nongnu" . "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/nongnu/")

",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(setq configuration-layer--elpa-archives
    '(("melpa-cn" . "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/melpa/")

",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"develop-分支","children":"develop 分支"}],"

",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(setq configuration-layer-elpa-archives

",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/cask/cask","rel":"nofollow","children":"Cask"}]," 是一个 Emacs Lisp 的项目管理工具。这里还是以 GNU ELPA 和 MELPA 为例，在添加下面的代码到 Cask"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"(source "gnu"   "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/gnu/")
(source "melpa" "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/melpa/")"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"关于-elpa-的选择","children":"关于 ELPA 的选择"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["(来自",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/xuchunyang","rel":"nofollow","children":"@xuchunyang"}],")"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"假如不清楚需要用哪些 ELPA 的话"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"gnu"}]," 一般是必备的，其它的 elpa 中的包会依赖 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"gnu"}]," 中的包"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"nongnu"}]," 建议启用，类似于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"melpa"}]," 但是 Emacs 官方维护的"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"melpa"}]," 滚动升级，收录了的包的数量最大"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"stable-melpa"}]," 依据源码的 Tag（Git）升级，数量比 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"melpa"}]," 少，因为很多包作者根本不打 Tag"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"org"}]," 仅仅为了 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"org-plus-contrib"}]," 这一个包，org 重度用户使用"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"gnu-devel"}]," 收录 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"gnu"}]," 中的包的开发中版本，一般不必启用（与 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"gnu"}]," 的关系类似于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"melpa"}]," 与 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"stable-melpa"}]," 的关系）"]}],"

"]}],"
",["$r","h1",null,{"id":"上游","children":"上游"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本文档参考了 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://elpa.emacs-china.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"http://elpa.emacs-china.org/"}]," 提供的帮助。"]}],"
",["$r","h1",null,{"id":"url-bug","children":"URL Bug"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["各个仓库的 URL 末尾一定要加",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/"}],"，否则会无法拉取，提示",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Failed to download melpa archive"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["事实上，末尾没有",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/"}],"的话，emacs 会去尝试取以下链接："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/melpaarchive-contents"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"而正常的链接应该是"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/melpa/archive-contents"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["这个是 emacs 自己的 bug。在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/melpa/melpa/issues/2139","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://github.com/melpa/melpa/issues/2139"}]," 中有描述。"]}]]}]
